Name: Windsurfing MMX
About the game: The development team of ”Windsurfing The Game” worked on providing a close-to-reality simulation of windsurfing. The aim is to provide as much as possible of the fun and excitement this sport gives. Features: Realistic 3-Dimensional Realtime Simulation of Windsurf, featuring: – Accurate behavior of the windsurf – Realistic movements of the sea, variable windspeed and direction – Multiplayer online mode – 3 different wave heat durations – Freestyle – Slalom Downwind – Jumps and Moves (Jibes, Table-top, Loops, Goiter…) – Score submission to the website to compete with the community – Several locations, boards, sails and more available Minimum requirements: – Processor speed greater than 1.6GHz – Windows 7 with DirectX 9 – Sound card – 3D-Accelerated Graphic Card supporting Vertex Shaders V2.0 The Game was tested successfully on: – NVidias GeForce 7600, 8600 Series and above – Intel graphic chip 4500MHD
Meta Title: Windsurfing MMX: Aug 29, 2022, Jérôme Six and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Windsurfing MMX? Check out the release date (Aug 29, 2022), developer insights from Jérôme Six, and a complete game summary.
